comments.author: salad daging
comments.body: I have logged into this platform with a random email and was not asked for email verification after signing up.Then there is no depositing BTC or other popular coins except your own coin $ARENA? And it has to be linked to Metamask?FAQ and Terms of service links don't work? We want to see the TOS and where is that link?There is no license for this site? Usually gambling sites have a license like in general.

comments.author: xLays
comments.body: Quote from: Royse777 on October 03, 2023, 02:12:19 AMWelcome to the forum. The logo seems familiar? To be honest the logo looked like it was auto generated logo. I've seen this kind of logo many times especially among streamers. They've been here since 2021, but they weren't active until they finally created announcement thread. Hopefully, they will run another promotion exclusively for the Bitcointalk community, just like many other gambling websites that have posted their announcement threads here on Bitcointalk.

comments.author: Bitinity
comments.body: Is it a rebranded casino from btcarena.gg? The design of the ANN thread is 99% the same and OP is also quoting the ANN thread post of btcarena.gg in other thread. Quote from: xLays on October 03, 2023, 02:55:44 AMThey've been here since 2021, but they weren't active until they finally created announcement thread. Hopefully, they will run another promotion exclusively for the Bitcointalk community, just like many other gambling websites that have posted their announcement threads here on Bitcointalk. What I dont understand is that the old representative was not active just after he announced that btcarena.gg is launched officially.

comments.author: Text

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: welcome to the forum. your thread is very beautiful, congratulations, in recent times most people who come to announce their new casino, have had problems in the ANN thread, they create an ann thread that is not beautiful, not flashy, so the forum members had to stay telling the creator of the ann thread to buy copper member. Anyway, at least you came well prepared for this part. in the thread part it's fine, but when I entered your casino I see that it doesn't work: FAQ, Terms Of Service, Probably Fair. This is very strange, because it is the most important things that must work. So you ran to create a thread here on the forum but you didn't check whether everything is working correctly or not in your casino, this could be bad in terms of people thinking about trusting your casinoHow are people going to create an account at a casino where they don't know about the rules of that same casino? and to make things even worse, in 2019 there was a casino with the same name and designer as your casino:üî∂BTCArena.ggüî∂ALL NEW COMMUNITY DICE GAME üèÜTHE FIRST PVP LOTTERY/COINFLIP SITEit's the same casino?It's the same owner?In 2021 you created a thread to announce the beta phase of your casino:üî• Arena.GG Final BETA event! Giving away 5$üí∞ $175 bonus drawpeople kept posting on your thread and you disappeared without giving any reason, today you came back to create another thread to announce the same casino. I wonder: what happened to make you disappear without giving a reason and then reappear almost 2 years later?I saw that your casino also has a token, looking at coinmarketcap:https://coinmarketcap.com/dexscan/ethereum/0x6eec66dab0e6a21f367fabba2c47c449de7d3a31/#TradeHistoryI don't see exchanges, but what is your objective with this token?

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Quote from: salad daging on October 03, 2023, 02:27:28 AMThen there is no depositing BTC or other popular coins except your own coin $ARENA? And it has to be linked to Metamask?I mght be wrong but it seems like a way for them to promote their token, which we would have not have any issue with if they also added other means of deposit and right now I don't really trust the site enough to connect any of my wallets to it ( and that should goes for others also tryin gto test out the site).QuoteFAQ and Terms of service links don't work? We want to see the TOS and where is that link?The one at the footer of the pager does not work but you can get it from the registration page, so here's the link incase you want to go through it. https://arena.gg/tosOp, you still have some work to do in your casino, first should be the implementation of a other deposit options other than your token, after which you should also add link to your ToS and FAQ at the footer of your page that way it will be easier for visitor to locate and go through.

comments.author: o48o
comments.created_time: October 06, 2023, 11:08:57 PMLast edit: October 06, 2023, 11:52:03 PM by o48o
comments.body: The fact there's no "FAQ" and "Terms Of Service" links. It just plain text saying that is a huge red flag.And because of that i have no info even on how $ARENA is mined or how it even works. Does it give dividends directly to your own wallet or the wallet that's hosted by the site? And do you get $arena by holding $arena? Why would anyone want that?Your Top 10s Leaderboard shows that only 8 people hold any $arena and looks like it shows their eth addresses by default which seems a little invasive imho

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: Quote from: www.Gambler.Casino on October 03, 2023, 05:31:27 PMQuote from: Slow death on October 03, 2023, 08:51:07 AMIn 2021 you created a thread to announce the beta phase of your casino:üî• Aren[Suspicious link removed] Final BETA event! Giving away 5$üí∞ $175 bonus drawpeople kept posting on your thread and you disappeared without giving any reason, today you came back to create another thread to announce the same casino. I wonder: what happened to make you disappear without giving a reason and then reappear almost 2 years later?I saw that your casino also has a token, looking at coinmarketcap:https://coinmarketcap.com/dexscan/ethereum/0x6eec66dab0e6a21f367fabba2c47c449de7d3a31/#TradeHistoryI don't see exchanges, but what is your objective with this token?This looks very strange. Why does the thought arise - is this establishment reliable?To be honest, I wouldn't use this casino, that's because there was a thread made by him in the past and he disappeared without explaining why he had to leave, which clearly shows that it's not his main concern to please his customers, so he can come back disappearing again as soon as people put money into his casino and see that just like in the past he also created a thread in this thread and didn't respond to anyone, it's been 4 days without him having entered the forum, in other words he disappeared again, no I know if this time he would only return in 2 years or if he disappeared for a few daysbut we have to ask ourselves: what does the behavior of someone mean when they present a service in which their objective is to have customers and that person disappears, the customers ask him questions and he, who is the owner of the services, is not able to respond, could this be a problem? would the behavior of a person intend to run a serious, honest business for many years? Let's imagine that people put money on his website and have problems depositing and withdrawing, would he be active in responding quickly to people? When I look at people who do this, I'm scared to create an account on their websiteSome thread owners who have this behavior, after disappearing for a long time when they come back to the forum, start to complain that they disappeared because they didn't have time because they were busy with the casino, so I wonder why they posted something incomplete? We'll see if Op returns and what he will say about his disappearance.

comments.author: Text
comments.body: Quote from: Slow death on October 06, 2023, 11:31:51 PMTo be honest, I wouldn't use this casino, that's because there was a thread made by him in the past and he disappeared without explaining why he had to leave, which clearly shows that it's not his main concern to please his customers, so he can come back disappearing again as soon as people put money into his casino and see that just like in the past he also created a thread in this thread and didn't respond to anyone, it's been 4 days without him having entered the forum, in other words he disappeared again, no I know if this time he would only return in 2 years or if he disappeared for a few days-snipThat is certainly concerning. I think they are actively promoting their token and encouraging new members to buy it on Discord. Therefore, I would advise caution when considering the use of their casino. We are unsure of their reliability, so it's better to avoid it. There are many other reputable and trustworthy casinos available, so it's not worth the risk of using one that has a history of poor customer service.
